title: SolarWinds security advisory (AV26-063)
description: On January 28, 2026, SolarWinds published security advisories to address critical vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: SolarWinds Web Help Desk  versions prior to 2026.1
SolarWinds Web Help Desk  version 12.8.8 HF1 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
